member.summary: Returns the results for an specified type - coffe, PointOfInterest, Lunch, Dinner.
member.param: The coordinates in google maps format
The minimum price that the user wants to pay, 0 (cheapest) - 4 (most expensive)
The minimum price that the user wants to pay, 0 (cheapest) - 4 (most expensive)
The type of search (Coffee, PointOfInterest, Lunch, Dinner)
The index to initialize the search in google results
member.returns: Result with the first valid ocurrence and the skip indicating the index of this ocurrence
